questions.question: What is the total addressable market (TAM)?
Who are the main competitors of the company?
What is the company’s customer acquisition strategy?
What are the key financial metrics?
What is the company’s burn rate?
What are the identified risks and mitigation strategies?
What are the key external and market risks the company faces?
What is the scalability and defensibility of the technology?
Look if company has patents, compare on the detail level if the actual business is likely the same as where patent was granted?
